items.sentence: Do you remember what time it was when you heard the explosion?

Tom did what most people would\'ve done in the same situation.
Tom didn\'t have a chance to visit Mary when he was in Boston.
Tom didn\'t just sprain his ankle. He broke three of his toes.
Tom didn\'t know why Mary refused to go to the dance with him.

The longer you wait to tell Tom, the harder it\'s going to be.
We don\'t like our neighbors, and they don\'t like us, either.
